segments.text: Hello , I'd like to get a seat on flight PB12 to Rome .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any discount for a non-direct flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Right now it's the slack season so we will give you ten percent off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What if I buy around ticket ? Can you offer me some more ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . you can get a further discount at 5 % .
segments.speaker: S2
